AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.description1: Sworn bailiff practicing in Casablanca for over 15 years. With solid legal training and extensive experience in the judicial field, he puts his expertise at the service of individuals and professionals.
AboutSection.description2: Our firm stands out for its professionalism, rigor, and commitment to providing high-quality legal services. We place particular importance on listening to our clients and understanding their specific needs to offer them tailored solutions.

ContactSection.title: Contact Us
ContactSection.description: For any information request or appointment, please don't hesitate to contact us. We will respond as soon as possible.
ContactSection.address: 3 Rue de Thann Bd rahhal el meskini, Casablanca 20000, Morocco
ContactSection.subject: Subject
ContactSection.submitError: Failed to send message. Please try again.

HeroSection.description: Khaddari Abdelmottalib, sworn judicial officer, accompanies you in all your legal procedures with rigor and professionalism.

MissionsSection.title: Our Mission
MissionsSection.description: As a ministerial officer, our mission is to ensure the execution of court decisions and guarantee the legal security of our clients.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: We are committed to handling your cases quickly and efficiently.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: We guarantee absolute discretion and professionalism in handling your affairs.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Our team is trained to provide you with impeccable quality service.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We remain available, attentive, and responsive to your specific needs.

MissionsSection.commitment: "Our commitment: to provide you with quality, personalized legal service tailored to your specific needs."

QuoteSection.quote: "Justice is the constant and perpetual will to render to each his due."
QuoteSection.author: Ulpian, Roman jurist

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.description: Our bailiff's office offers a comprehensive range of legal services to meet your needs.

actService.title: Service of Process
actService.description: Official notification of legal documents to concerned parties.

judgmentExecution.title: Judgment Enforcement
judgmentExecution.description: Implementation of court decisions and debt collection.

observations.title: Official Reports
observations.description: Establishment of legal evidence through factual observations.

debtRecovery.title: Debt Collection
debtRecovery.description: Amicable and judicial procedures for recovery of due amounts.

legalDrafting.title: Legal Drafting
legalDrafting.description: Preparation of legal documents compliant with current legislation.

legalAdvice.title: Legal Advice
legalAdvice.description: Guidance and support in your legal procedures.

Footer.officeAddress: 3 Rue de Thann Bd rahhal el meskini, Casablanca 20000, Morocco
Footer.description: Bailiff in Casablanca specialized in notification, execution and observation procedures.
